.. _amdgpu_synid_gfx8_ssamp:

ssamp
=====

Sampler constant used to specify filtering options applied to the image data after it is read.

*Size:* 4 dwords.

*Operands:* :ref:`s<amdgpu_synid_s>`, :ref:`ttmp<amdgpu_synid_ttmp>`
